name: Sonic Boom
description: Immersive wireless sound, long battery life, and active noise cancellation. Designed for serious audiophiles.

name: BassBeast
description: Powerful bass, ergonomic fit, and stylish matte finish. Ideal for bass lovers.

name: AirTune
description: Crisp audio with Bluetooth 5.2 and ultra-light design for all-day comfort.

name: Echo Pro
description: Professional-grade audio and ambient mode. Excellent for work and play.

name: NovaSound
description: Sleek, colorful design with long-lasting battery and powerful mids.

name: ZenPods
description: Budget-friendly wireless earbuds with decent noise isolation.
